reviewText: Ordered this and it came opened. Reordered it and second one came open. Because there was no additional one, just kept it, but I was upset because it was a gift and it looked used.
A faithful adaptation of my childhood's favorite books--pleased disregard anyone giving this  "1" rating...trolls posting for their own needs. The series is awesome!

Great packaging, however most disks were damaged during production with major scratches.  The only disk that was good was an eye watering experience to watch.  A very poor low grade copy of a copy of a copy etc.  Unwatchable on a 55inch TV.  I returned it for a full refund. Don't waste your money.
